summary: LTR THE DEFECTIVE ESP CONTROL MODULE "SAFETY FEATURE" WHICH CAUSED THE SPEED TO AUTOMATICALLY... *MR  WITHOUT WARNING THE SAFETY SUDDENLY ACTIVATED AND HAD BECOME IMPOSSIBLE TO MAINTAIN A GOOD SPEED ON THE HIGHWAY.  THE SPEED WAS REDUCED TO 20-30MPH AND HAD TO STAY IN THE FAR RIGHT LANE.  THE PROBLEM WAS DIAGNOSED AS A FAULTY ESP(ELECTRONIC STABILITY PROGRAM) CONTROL MODULE WHICH HAD SENT A FALSE WARNING.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED INFORMATION IN REFERENCE TO OTHER OWNERS OF THE SAME OR LIKE MODEL WHO HAVE EXPERIENCED THE SAME PROBLEM.  (2002 S430)  SCC
